text: Hi Guys, How can I query this endpoint ( <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_recently_updated_contacts> ) every 10 seconds ?  I already got the changes of the last 29 days, 23 hours, 59 minutes and 55 seconds . But I dont know how to get the data in real time.  Should I use webhook for this?

Hey, <@UBQSVT1HA>. Webhook subscriptions to contact creations and specific property changes are your best bet for getting this data in “real time.” I would not recommend polling the _Get recently updated and created contacts_ endpoint that frequently, but I know some people do it once a day or even a couple times a day.
